problem_text_cn: 若用圆心角为120°,半径为9的扇形围成一个圆锥侧面(接缝忽略不计),则这个圆锥的底面直径是()
problem_text_en: If a sector with a central angle of N_0 and a radius of N_1 is used to enclose a cone side (the joints are ignored), then the bottom diameter of the cone is ()
raw_answer: 解:设这个圆锥的底面半径为r,∵扇形的弧长=\frac{120\cdotπ\cdot9}{180}=6π,∴2πr=6π,∴2r=6,即圆锥的底面直径为6．故选:B．
